title: MANUFACTURE OF BRUSHES
informative_references: Brushes characterised by the way in which the bristles are fixed or joined in or on the brush body or carrier
definition_statement: This place covers: Tools, machines, blanks and methods for manufacturing brushes

title: Bristles; Selection of materials for bristles  (making artificial bristles D01D, D01F)
Preparing, {i.e. Manufacturing} brush bodies
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods and devices for making brushes.

title: {by moulding or casting a body around bristles or tufts of bristles}
{of the carousel or drum type  (A46D3/067 takes precedence)}
{of the belt or chain type  (A46D3/067 takes precedence)}
Pressing devices for making brooms composed of brushwood or the like
definition_statement: This place covers: Tools or elements for pressing the bristles together generaly on the anchoring side in the process of manufacturing/assembling a broom.

title: Machines for finishing brushes {(A46D1/00 and A46D3/00 take precedence)}
definition_statement: This place covers: Machines for finishing or testing completed brushes.
